gettingInContact.title: Getting in contact with us
gettingInContact.paragraph_1: To look after our Customer Service staff we have introduced social distancing measures - this includes shift working and working from home. This is to reduce the number of people in our offices at any one time.
gettingInContact.paragraph_2_start: If you do need to contact us please send us a secure message through Online Banking or our
gettingInContact.paragraph_2_end: Alternatively, please contact your relationship manager. Please only contact us by phone if you cannot do what you need to through our website or if you urgently need our help. This will keep our teams available to help our most vulnerable customers.

scheduledMaintenance.title: Scheduled Maintenance
scheduledMaintenance.paragraph_1: Online Banking will not be available between 8.00pm and 10.00pm on Sunday 1 November 2020, 29 November 2020 and 2 January 2021. If you are completing a transaction when the maintenance starts it will not be processed. If you are unsure if a transaction was processed, please log in to Online Banking after the scheduled maintenance and check your online transaction status. We apologize for any inconvenience.

rightCol.paragraph_1: Odyssey Bank Limited is authorised by the Prudential Regulation Authority and regulated by the Financial Conduct Authority and the Prudential Regulation Authority. Our main business is the provision of financial services under registration number no. 575105.
rightCol.paragraph_2: Eligible deposits with Odyssey Bank Limited are protected up to a total of £85,000 by the Financial Services Compensation Scheme, the UK’s deposit guarantee scheme. Any deposits you hold above the protected limit are unlikely to be covered. Further information is
rightCol.paragraph_3: Odyssey Bank Limited is a member of UK Finance and subscribes to the Standards of Lending Practice published by the Lending Standards Board which covers good practice in relation to loans, overdrafts and other types of lending that we do not currently offer. Further information is

reactivateISAModalWindow.information:
I declare that this application form has been completed to the best of my knowledge and belief. I will notify Odyssey UK Bank Online without any delay of any change in my circumstances affecting any of the information given in this Application. Where the information I have supplied relates to other people. I declare that I am authorised by them to disclose that information and to accept the terms on their behalf. Bank records will be updated from the information provided, where appropriate.

In order to process your application, we need to carry out checks to verify your identity, address and other personal details.

importantInformation.title: Important Information
importantInformation.paragraph_1: Under SEPA, all bank accounts must be identified by an International Bank Account Number (IBAN) and a Bank Identifier Code (BIC). To make a payment, the International Bank Account Number (IBAN) must be used. The Bank Identifier Code (BIC) is optional.
importantInformation.paragraph_2: There are 33 countries in the SEPA area. These are the existing 28 member states of the European Union: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovenia, Slovakia, Spain, Sweden and the United Kingdom. Finally Iceland, Lichtenstein, Monaco, Norway and Switzerland also are participants.
importantInformation.paragraph_3: Customers can make payments to Revenue using a current bank account located in any of the 33 participating countries. Where customers have any concerns, they should confirm with their bank that the bank account they wish to use is SEPA reachable.
importantInformation.paragraph_4: The information in this document is provided as a guide only and is not professional advice, including legal advice. It should not be assumed that the guidance is comprehensive or that it provides a definitive answer in every case.

importantInformation.title: Important Information
importantInformation.paragraph_2: Payments can only be made to other GBP accounts. Standing Orders cannot be set up for same day payment. Any pay dates that fall on any UK non-working day will be paid on the nearest working day. By proceeding with this request, you confirm that you accept any applicable transaction charges displayed via the rates and charges menu.

payeeForm.reference_tooltip: To help you identify this transaction in you account statement

importantInformation.title: Important Information
importantInformation.paragraph_1: Please enter the full name of recipient to prevent any possible delays in payment.
importantInformation.paragraph_2: All GBP payments within the UK will be sent as Faster payments, provided that the sort code is reachable by Faster payments and the amount is within the Online Banking Faster Payment limit, unless you tick the Send via CHAPS box on screen. Faster payments normally reach their destination within 2 hours of being sent although this cannot be guaranteed. CHAPS payments received after 3.30pm (UK time) or any UK non-working day will be processed the next working day.
importantInformation.paragraph_3: Payment requests will be processed in the order in which they are submitted and are subject to available funds at the time of Processing. Please ensure the payee account number and sort code are correct before proceeding as payments art processed on these details and not the name of the payee. If these details are given incorrectly, this may result in the payment being delayed or not received and you may incur a loss. If you provide incorrect details this may result in the transfer being delayed or not received. We will not be liable for any loss suffered by you or anyone else as a result of providing us with incorrect information, such an incorrect account and/or sort code.
importantInformation.paragraph_4: By proceeding with your request, you accept the applicable transaction changes as displayed via the Rates and charges menu or on the confirmation screen.

importantInformationNotificationModal.title: Important Information
importantInformationNotificationModal.message: Please enter the full name of the recipient to prevent any possible delays in payment
